channel.title: Comments on: My PS4 refuses to turn off lol

item.title: By: Character-Agent-5366
item.dc:creator: Character-Agent-5366
item.description: Way to hang in there PS4

item.title: By: SacredHolyBlueYoshi
item.dc:creator: SacredHolyBlueYoshi
item.description: It was probably doing things. When you turn it off it has to close/stop what it was doing. It doesn't just cut the power off. Could be things that required the HDD or software.
item.content:encoded: It was probably doing things. When you turn it off it has to close/stop what it was doing. It doesn’t just cut the power off. Could be things that required the HDD or software.

item.title: By: TheBestlsYetToCome
item.dc:creator: TheBestlsYetToCome
item.description: Just hold the power button until it force shuts down. It's a little more gentle than ripping the power cord out of the wall.
item.content:encoded: Just hold the power button until it force shuts down. It’s a little more gentle than ripping the power cord out of the wall.

item.title: By: camaroadam
item.dc:creator: camaroadam
item.description: Unplug it. Show it you have the upper hand here lol.
item.content:encoded: Unplug it. Show it you have the upper hand here lol.

item.title: By: Lochlan_Da_Lad
item.dc:creator: Lochlan_Da_Lad
item.description: I’m about to leave home so when I come back I’ll give an update to how long it’s at
item.content:encoded: I’m about to leave home so when I come back I’ll give an update to how long it’s at

item.title: By: Salty_Entertainer284
item.dc:creator: Salty_Entertainer284
item.description: Reasons why I can’t wait to get my ps5
item.content:encoded: Reasons why I can’t wait to get my ps5

item.title: By: Lochlan_Da_Lad
item.dc:creator: Lochlan_Da_Lad
item.description: Guys don’t worry, I can fix it, I’m just trying to see how long I can go for
item.content:encoded: Guys don’t worry, I can fix it, I’m just trying to see how long I can go for

item.title: By: fcmiller84
item.dc:creator: fcmiller84
item.description: It's a free country. It has a right to stay on if it wants to lol
item.content:encoded: It’s a free country. It has a right to stay on if it wants to lol

item.title: By: memphisba
item.dc:creator: memphisba
item.description: Maybe ur HD is full. I got that before and did a hard reset.
item.content:encoded: Maybe ur HD is full. I got that before and did a hard reset.

item.title: By: Slasherly
item.dc:creator: Slasherly
item.description: Unplugging the ethernet cable fixes this. You have ethernet cable or wifi?
item.content:encoded: Unplugging the ethernet cable fixes this. You have ethernet cable or wifi?
